info.name: User List
info.summary: Show a list of all local users
info.description:
This Nextcloud App displays a simple static list of all local users of a Nextcloud instance. Various contact information is displayed (email, groups, phone number).
This functionality cannot be achieved with the current apps (2018-04), but is planned for the future: https://github.com/nextcloud/server/issues/693 This app may then become redundant.
info.author: Marvin Bernhardt
